document.query: CREATE TABLE `so_service` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `sale_id` bigint(20), `promo_code_id` bigint(20), `amount` int(255), `type` varchar(255), `disabled` varchar(255), `created_at` varchar(255), `updated_at` varchar(255), PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
